headers.Feature-Policy: microphone 'none'; camera 'none'; vibrate 'none'; payment 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; push 'none'
headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; child-src 'self'; font-src 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-src 'self'; img-src 'self' cdn.domain.com; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'sha256-blablah='
